marklogic.body:
Other fun LRH factoids.
He won three Heisman Trophies. He was Ms. October 1973. He was the voice of Charlie in the original Charlie's Angels. He developed Cold fusion. He was the 1st man to dive to the bottom of the Marianas Trench and to climb Mt. Everest all in the same day. He could walk and chew gum with ease. He hit for the cycle in every baseball game (whether on Mothar or Teegack) he ever played in. He was in inspiration for every character in the original Star Trek. He could speed read James Joyce's Ulysses. He was self taught and fluent in every language on Earth including the multiple dialects of dolphin. He invented Spam. He was the the only independent political candidate to win the office of the Presidency of the United States in the modern Era, sweeping every State and winning more electoral and popular votes than any other candidate in history. He shot both the sheriff and the deputy. Â
Dos Equis guy has nothing on LRH, the original world's most interesting man.Â Stay enturbulated my friends. Â Â
